channel.title: When you are drawing
channel.description:
How do you feel?
I feel like this sometimes simply because I don't feel like it when I do some how... [img]http://fc02.deviantart.com/fs21/f/2007/259/6/b/016___drawing_by_chopstickmadness.jpg[/img]
Excuse upcoming language - facial expression time :mad:! Sometimes I'm overcome by a powerful urge to draw something on paper, yet I have no fcuking inspiration to do so! And when that happens, I become upset for not being able to fucking draw! GRRRR! I go crazy when something pops in my head and then I suddently feel like I don't wanna draw it, yet I do! GRRR Shit is annoying how you come up with a idea and then BAM! You don't wanna draw it and later on you feel like it and then you forget what you wanna draw -.- [b] sometimes i donno why i want to draw...[/b] sometimes i feel sad when i cant draw what i want... [b]sometimes i feel like give up drawing...[/b]
drawing should be happy isnt it??
[b]drawing just makes me crazy...[/b]

item.title: When you are drawing
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

Sadly, I have to agree with you. I gave up drawing a number of years ago, due to the fact I had other interests. I was a distinguished artist too. But up until recently, I never thought of drawing, and when I went to draw, it was an utter failure. I can’t draw for shit now. And I have no creative inspiration. No idea of what to draw. And I want to draw, but I can’t. I don’t know where to start, and how.

Wow same here. My drawings in 3rd grade are better than now. It’s sad… I’ll upload one of my latest drawing I did in class, which is pretty decent.

Read full topic

item.title: When you are drawing
item.dc:creator: @Ixl_Adds_Ixl Ixl Adds Ixl
item.description:
@Ixl_Adds_Ixl wrote:

I can draw, its just that sometime while drawing I get to the good part and start to get the influential emotion to quit… Sometimes it takes me a week to draw something that makes me wanna quit even though I don’t, I just take a break & come back to it. Sometimes I just force myself to draw because of the emotion that convinces me to stop…Sometimes…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Oxy Oxy
item.description:
@Oxy wrote:

exps35:

Wow. Go take your emo culture elsewhere.

STFU, I thought Mopar was meant to be a welcoming community were you can’t put out your problems and other people will help but I guess not. And do you have something against someone with a mental illness? Shame on you.

On topic:
Yea, mate I feel the same way you never have the inspiration at the right time, but don’t get all court up in it otherwise you will end up doing something stupid, also try and vent all your problems into it also mabey try a sport like skating or something

Sadly, I have to agree with you. I gave up drawing a number of years ago, due to the fact I had other interests. I was a distinguished artist too. But up until recently, I never thought of drawing, and when I went to draw, it was an utter failure. I can’t draw for shit now. And I have no creative inspiration. No idea of what to draw. And I want to draw, but I can’t. I don’t know where to start, and how.

item.title: When you are drawing
item.dc:creator: @Ixl_Adds_Ixl Ixl Adds Ixl
item.description:
@Ixl_Adds_Ixl wrote:

How do you feel?

I feel like this sometimes simply because I don’t feel like it when I do some how…

016___drawing_by_chopstickmadness.jpg600×600

Excuse upcoming language - facial expression time :mad:!
Sometimes I’m overcome by a powerful urge to draw something on paper, yet I have no fcuking inspiration to do so! And when that happens, I become upset for not being able to fucking draw! GRRRR! I go crazy when something pops in my head and then I suddently feel like I don’t wanna draw it, yet I do! GRRR Shit is annoying how you come up with a idea and then BAM! You don’t wanna draw it and later on you feel like it and then you forget what you wanna draw -.-

sometimes i donno why i want to draw…
sometimes i feel sad when i cant draw what i want…
sometimes i feel like give up drawing…

drawing should be happy isnt it??

drawing just makes me crazy…
